resources.string: Hello, you might wonder, who in the earth would use this kind of app. This is a pure test application to document and test creating build variants and release automation. If you want to, you can go and check my Github and there you can find this app as an open source project: github.com/tarup/spicecabinet

Content of this app comes from following sources

Wikipedia 
Taste
Pixabay
amyinthekitchen.com
annabellebreakey.com
